Event.name: Scheduling
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> schedules an <fen>Event</fen> to take place at a specified <fen>Scheduled_time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Gina</fex> <t>scheduled</t> <fex name="Event">a dentist appointment</fex> <fex name="Scheduled_time">for Monday</fex> <fex name="Place">in Berkeley</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">Christa</fex> <t>set</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Event">an afternoon meeting</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to discuss the new prototype</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The sentient being who schedules an <fen>Event</fen> to take place at a <fen>Time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>set</t> <t>up</t> a meeting with Carlos on Monday.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The incident that the <fen>Agent</fen> has scheduled to take place at a <fen>Time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex>I'd like to <t>set</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="Event">a meeting with Mr. Hofmann</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Scheduled_time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Event</fen> is scheduled to take place.
<ex>Maria <t>scheduled</t> the appointment <fex name="Scheduled_time">for Monday</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> has scheduled the <fen>Event</fen> to take place.
<ex>Gina <t>scheduled</t> a dentist appointment for Monday <fex name="Place">in Berkeley</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Beneficiary
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person for whom the <fen>Event</fen> was scheduled by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex>My mom <t>scheduled</t> a dentist appointment <fex name="Beneficiary">for me</fex> tomorrow morning.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The frequency with which the <fen>Agent</fen> schedules and <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Frequency">Every Monday morning</fex> my assistant <t>schedules</t> the weekly meeting according to employee availability.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The means used by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to schedule the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>Chad always <t>schedules</t> his appointments <fex name="Means">via email</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fex name="Agent">Agent's</fex> motivation for scheduling the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>My boss <t>scheduled</t> a meeting <fex name="Purpose">to let us know how great we were doing</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The cause for the scheduling of the <fen>Event</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Agent</fen> schedules the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>Jackie <fex name="Manner">hastily</fex> <t>scheduled</t> an appointment with a psychologist this evening.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the time at which the scheduling occurs.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: schedule.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to plan an event to take place at a specified time

lexUnit.name: set up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to arrange a time and place for an event to occur

lexUnit.name: arrange.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to schedule an event to take place at a time and place
